MainArmor._COMMENT: What areas of the body do you want to protect?

HeadAreas._COMMENT: Enable this only if you want only particular areas protected, otherwire Head: true is enough

GodMode._COMMENT: Enable this to disable penetration of armor. (i.e., 0 throughput)

Blacklist._COMMENT: Set to false to remove chance of pmc bots spawning with this item in their inventory.
